actionList.title: Board Meeting Public Comment董事会会议公众意见
actionList.textContent: The next PPS board meeting will be held November 16th. Community members wishing to provide public comment can do so virtually. If you would like to sign up for public comment, please send an email with your first and last name, your school community, and topic to PublicComment@pps.net or call the Board Office at 503-916-3741. Requests for public comment will be processed in the order that they are received. Email and phone requests should be received by 12:00 pm the day of the meeting. Please note, public comment by any individual is limited to one time every 30 days. Written public comment may be sent to: 下一次 PPS 董事会会议将于 11 月 16 日举行。 社区成员可以注册 申请在董事会会议上提供公众评论。 如果您想注册， 请将您的姓名、 学校社区和主题发电子邮件至 PublicComment @pps.net， 或致电董事会办公室 503 - 916 - 3741。 公众评论要求将按照收到的顺序进行处理。 电子邮件和电话应在会议当天下午 12: 00 之前收到。 请注意， 任何个人的公开评论仅限于每 30 天一次。 书面公众意见可发送至：

actionList.title: Petition to Save Woodstock School 拯救伍德思道克小学请愿书
actionList.textContent: 请注意-该网站会请您签署其他请愿书并要求捐款。请不要捐钱。其他请愿书与我们的请愿书无关。
actionList.htmlContent: 点击此处签署请愿书

eventList.title: SECG Meeting, Dec. 2nd, 6pm
eventList.textContent: Community engagement update, Decide on scenarios for community engagement, Review impact to BIPOC and other groups, Narrow scenario set through consensus exercise.

eventList.title: PPS Board Meeting, Nov. 16th, 6pm PPS董事会会议，11月16日下午6点
eventList.textContent: 我们暂时不清楚董事会会议和东南指导联盟工作会的内容，猜想应该会对现有的提案、新的提案以及下一步的工作发布新的信息

eventList.title: SECG Meeting, Nov 18th 6pm 东南指导联盟工作会议， 11月18日下午6点
SE Guiding Coalition Community Conversations, RESCHEDULED Nov. 19th 东南指导联盟社区讨论会改到11月19日
eventList.textContent: For the next Community Conversation on Friday, November 19th at 5:00 PM, Dr. Omogbehin, Regional Superintendent will be present.  This meeting will be a follow-up from the last Community Conversation regarding the Enrollment and Program Balancing proposals that were recently shared with the SE Guiding Coalition. You can join through the following Google Meet code/link: 地区校监Omogbehin 博士将出席 11 月 19 日星期五下午 5 点举行的社区对话。这次对话将是上次社区对话的后续会议， 讨论最近与东南指导联盟分享的招生和项目平衡提案。 您可以通过以下 Google Meet 代码 / 链接参加会议：
